snippet.title: Chronicles of Magic: Divided Kingdoms Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on Steam, iOS, Mac, Windows and Android!

https://www.artifexmundi.com/g/chronicles-magic-divided-kingdoms/

Kingdom's Peace is marred by the appearance of the mysterious Black Knight. His identity and intentions are unknown, but when he kidnaps your only son Nevin, you follow him in pursuit. As Gillian, explore two worlds and use the Magic Scrolls to discover the truth about a forgotten royal lineage.
